headline: Assessing Texas Pacific Land (TPL) After Its AI Data Center Partnership With Bolt Data & Energy
summary: Texas Pacific Land (TPL) has drawn fresh attention after unveiling a partnership with Bolt Data & Energy to build large-scale data center campuses on its West Texas land, supported by a US$50 million investment and water supply rights. See our latest analysis for Texas Pacific Land. The data center announcement comes after a strong run in the share price, with a 27.83% 1 month share price return and 38.07% year to date. Over a 1 year period, the total shareholder return is a loss of 8.23%,...
